section.title: Samples 1 Documentation Overview
section.p: Samples are currently split into two areas. This is purely to help envisage and document by example the usage of tabs and sub-tabs. One section is no more important than the other.

ul.li: The Navigation Menu will show documentation contained in the 'samples-b' directory.
The Navigation highlights the current page. (This index.html page has a label of 'Overview')
Apache Doc V2.0 A demonstration document using all elements in the Apache Forrest xdocs document-v20.dtd.
HowTo Describes the steps neccessary to create a How-To document.
Embedded HTML A demonstration page showing how to embed HTML in Forrest.
ascii-art page ASCII Art Sample page.
Using SVG Using Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), contains links to SVG examples.
Usemap Interactive client-side imagemaps - the usemap attribute.
Custom Schema Contains a custom schema example.
XML Entities Using XML entities for character replacements.
Locationmap An introduction and examples of using the Locationmap.

section.title: Links to other Sample Documentation
section.p: Take a look at the Samples Index to view other samples sections. (Currently we have 'Samples 1' and 'Samples 2')
